title: Debugger crashes the whole window
body:
Hi
I'm trying to debug tx [`0xd45111d7c22a4ba4a1cd110c8224859000fcb0cd5cefd02bd40434ac42a07be6`](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xd45111d7c22a4ba4a1cd110c8224859000fcb0cd5cefd02bd40434ac42a07be6) using the source code from Etherscan.
Someway in the middle the debugger crashes and the whole window just goes blank.
I guess there are 2 issues here:
1. Some bug causes the debugger to crash.
2. When the debugger crashes it takes with it the whole app (I've experienced that a few times but only now I bother to report).

## Steps to reproduce
1. Open Remix
2.  Set an Etherscan access token in the settings
3. Set the environment to some mainnet provider (e.g. `https://rpc.ankr.com/eth`) 
4. Activate the debugger and load tx  `0xd45111d7c22a4ba4a1cd110c8224859000fcb0cd5cefd02bd40434ac42a07be6`
5. Make sure the debugger loaded the source files from Etherscan
6. Move the debugger slider to somewhere in the middle (try a few points in the middle if it doesn't crash immediately)
7. The whole window will crash
